Name: Scept-Seal
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Treecko, Grovyle, and Sceptile.  Swap a Scept-Claw and a Scept-Card for a Scept-Seal at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
